TransactionAlert.clearPendingText: {{chainName}} Transaction ({{nonces}}) has been pending for over 3 minutes. You can <5></5> <6>Clear Pending Locally</6> <7></7> and resubmit the transaction.
TransactionAlert.skipNonceText: Nonce #{{nonce}} skipped on {{chainName}} chain. This  may cause pending transactions ahead. <5></5> <6>Submit a tx</6> <7></7> on chain to resolve

signTx.gasLimitNotEnough: Gas limit is less than 21000. Transaction can't be submitted
signTx.gasLimitLessThanExpect: Gas limit is low. There is 1% chance that the transaction may fail.
signTx.gasLimitLessThanGasUsed: Gas limit is too low. There is 95% chance that the transaction may fail.
signTx.gasAccountForGas: Use USD from my GasAccount to pay for gas
signTx.nativeTokenForGas: Use {{tokenName}} token on {{chainName}} to pay for gas
signTx.nonceLowerThanExpect: Nonce is too low, the minimum should be {{0}}
signTx.canOnlyUseImportedAddress: You cannot sign transactions with a watch-only address.
signTx.multiSigChainNotMatch: Multi-signature addresses are not on this chain and cannot initiate transactions
signTx.safeAddressNotSupportChain: Current safe address is not supported on {{0}} chain
signTx.manuallySetGasLimitAlert: You have manually set the Gas limit to
signTx.gasNotRequireForSafeTransaction: Gas fee is not required for Safe transactions
signTx.eip1559Desc1: On chains that support EIP-1559, the Priority Fee is the tip for miners to process your transaction. You can save your final gas cost by lowering the Priority Fee, which may cost more time for the transaction to be processed.
signTx.eip1559Desc2: Here in Rabby, Priority Fee (Tip) = Max Fee - Base Fee. After you set up the Max Priority Fee, the Base Fee will be deducted from it and the rest will be tipped to miners.
signTx.hardwareSupport1559Alert: Make sure your hardware wallet firmware has been upgraded to the version that supports EIP 1559
signTx.gasLimitMinValueAlert: Gas limit should be more than 21000

gasAccount.description: Using GasAccount to pay for gas fees. View payment details below:

gasAccount.sendGas: The Gas transfer to you for current transaction:

tokenApprove.title: Token Approval
tokenApprove.contractTrustValueTip: Trust value refers to the total asset value spent by this contract. A low trust value indicates either risk or inactivity for 180 days.

nftApprove.title: NFT Approval
nftApprove.nftContractTrustValueTip: Trust value refers to the top NFT value spent by this contract. A low trust value indicates either risk or inactivity for 180 days.

signTx.l2GasEstimateTooltip: The gas estimate for L2 chain does not include the L1 gas fee. The actual fee will be higher than current estimate.

errorRetry.defaultTips: Something is wrong. Please retry later.

errorRetry.gasPriceTooLow: Gas price too low. We’ll adjust it by 30% to help your transaction confirm. Click “Retry” to confirm and try again.

errorRetry.nonceTooHigh: Nonce too high. Please adjust the nonce and try again.
errorRetry.alreadySubmitted: Transaction already submitted. Duplicate transaction detected.
errorRetry.gasExceedsBlockGasLimit: Gas exceeds block gas limit. Please adjust and try again.

rabbyFee.title: Rabby fee
rabbyFee.swapDesc: Rabby Wallet will always find the best possible rate from top aggregators and verify the reliability of their offers. Rabby charges a <1>0.25%</1> fee (0% for wrapping), which is automatically included in the quote.
rabbyFee.bridgeDesc: Rabby Wallet will always find the best possible rate from top aggregators and verify the reliability of their offers. Rabby charges a <1>0.25%</1> fee, which is automatically included in the quote.

lowCreditModal.title: This token has a low credit value
lowCreditModal.desc: A low credit value often signals high risk, such as a honeypot token or very low liquidity.

showMore.title: Show More

settings.enableWhitelistTip: Once enabled, you can only send assets to the addresses in the whitelist using Rabby.
settings.disableWhitelistTip: You can send assets to any address once disabled

tokenDetail.blockedTip: Blocked token will not be shown in token list
tokenDetail.selectedCustom: Token is not listed by Rabby. You've added it to the token list by custom.
tokenDetail.notSelectedCustom: Token is not listed by Rabby. It will be added to the token list if you switch on.
tokenDetail.notSupported: The token on this chain is not supported

offlineChain.tips: {{chain}} Chain will not be integrated on {{date}}. Your assets won’t be affected but won’t be included in your total balance. To access them, you may add it as a custom network in “Settings”.

createNewAddress.addressTopTips:
Use it to send and receive 
 crypto on blockchain
createNewAddress.passwordTopTips: This password will be used to unlock your wallet and encrypt your local data.
createNewAddress.backupSeedPhrase: Backup your seed phrase to restore your wallet if the app is deleted or your device is lost.
createNewAddress.WriteSeedPhrase: This is your seed phrase. Write it down and store it securely. If you lose it or share it, your assets could be lost forever. You'll be asked to re-enter this phrase (in order) in the next step.
createNewAddress.createNewDesc: Generate a new seed phrase for new wallets
createNewAddress.createOnCurrentDesc: Create wallet with an existing imported seed phrase
createNewAddress.riskTips: Before you begin, please read and keep these security tips in mind:

copySeedPhraseSecureTip.title: Keep Your SeedPhrase Secret
copySeedPhraseSecureTip.subTitle: Anyone who gets your seed phrase can fully control your funds.
copySeedPhraseSecureTip.tip1: Other apps may read your clipboard, so avoid switching apps after copying.
copySeedPhraseSecureTip.tip2: Do not paste or save your seed phrase in cloud services or notes apps.
copySeedPhraseSecureTip.tip3: Never share your seed phrase. We will never ask for it.
copySeedPhraseSecureTip.copied: Seed phrase copied. The clipboard will clear in 1 minute.

screenshotSecureTip.title: Screenshots aren’t secure
screenshotSecureTip.subTitle: Saving your seed phrase as an image can expose it, so writing it down is a safer option.
screenshotSecureTip.tip1: Screenshots can sync to the cloud or other devices, and may be accessed if a device is lost, stolen, or compromised.
screenshotSecureTip.tip2: Apps or malware can read images stored in your photo library.
screenshotSecureTip.tip3: Anyone who gets your seed phrase can take full control of your wallet, and this cannot be reversed.

multiAddressHome.foundGuideDesc: Add tokens to your wallet to get started.
multiAddressHome.importAddressDesc: Add an existing wallet with funds

tips.title: Is it safe to import into Rabby?
tips.description: Your data is securely encrypted and stored locally on your device. Rabby does not have access to your private information, and it is never shared with third parties.
tips.entry: Is it safe to import into Rabby

rateModalTriggerOnHome.description: How do you rate Rabby Wallet

rateModal.descriptionIOS: If you like Rabby, a quick rating on the App Store would mean a lot.
rateModal.descriptionAndroid: If you like Rabby, a quick rating on the Google Play would mean a lot.

homeCenterTipScreenshot.description: Take a screenshot anytime to quickly report a bug

homeGuidanceMultipleTabs.swipeToViewAllAssets: Swipe right to view all assets

whatIsSeedPhrase.title: What is a 'Seed phrase'
whatIsSeedPhrase.description1: A seed phrase is a series of words used to access and control your wallet. You can use it to recover your wallet on any device.
whatIsSeedPhrase.description2: If you lose your seed phrase, you won’t be able to restore your wallet.
whatIsSeedPhrase.description3: Never share your seed phrase—anyone with access to it can control your funds.
whatIsSeedPhrase.description4: Your seed phrase is stored locally on your device and encrypted with your password. Only you can access it. Rabby cannot retrieve or access your seed phrase.

whatIsPrivateKey.title: What's a private key
whatIsPrivateKey.description1: A private key is a string of letters and numbers used to access and control your wallet. You can use it to recover your wallet on any device.
whatIsPrivateKey.description2: If you lose your private key, you won’t be able to restore your wallet.
whatIsPrivateKey.description3: Never share your private key—anyone with access to it can control your funds.
whatIsPrivateKey.description4: Your private key is stored locally on your device and encrypted with your password. Only you can access it. Rabby cannot retrieve or access your private key.

addContacts.cameraTitle: Please scan the QR code with your camera

whatIsASeedPhrase.question: What is a Seed Phrase?
whatIsASeedPhrase.answer: A 12, 18, or 24-word phrase used to control your assets.

isItSafeToImportItInRabby.question: Is it safe to import it in Rabby?
isItSafeToImportItInRabby.answer: Yes, it will be stored locally on your phone and only accessible to you.

seedPhrase.importQuestion1: If I lose my seed phrase or share it with others, my assets will be lost forever.
seedPhrase.importQuestion2: The seed phrase is only stored on my phone, and Rabby has no access to it.
seedPhrase.importQuestion3: If I do not back up the seed phrase, and the app is unintentionally deleted, the device is lost, or reinstallation is required, Rabby cannot retrieve it for me.
seedPhrase.riskTips: Before you start, please read and keep the following security tips in mind.
seedPhrase.backupTips: Make sure no one else is watching your screen when you back up the seed phrase
seedPhrase.createdSuccess: Your seed phrase has been created
seedPhrase.chooseBackupMethodDesc: Backups let you restore your wallet if you delete the app or lose your device.
seedPhrase.backupUnlockDesc: Keep your password safe to restore backups. Rabby Wallet doesn't store it and can't recover it.
seedPhrase.backupRestoreUnlockDesc: Use the same password you set to encrypt your backups.

whatIsAPrivateKey.question: What is a private key?
whatIsAPrivateKey.answer: A string of letters and numbers used to control your assets.

isItSafeToImportItInRabby.question: Is it safe to import it in Rabby?
isItSafeToImportItInRabby.answer: Yes, it will be stored locally on your phone and only accessible to you.

tokenDetail.fdvContent: The market cap if the max supply was in circulation.Fully Diluted Valuation (FDV) = Price × Max Supply. If Max Supply is null, FDV = Price × Total Supply. If neither Max Supply nor Total Supply is defined or infinite, FDV is not displayed.
tokenDetail.excludeBalanceTips: This asset is excluded from your total balance for accuracy. You can tap it to view details and include it if preferred.

setting.clearPendingDesc1: This will clear all your pending transactions. This can help you solve the problem that in some cases the state of the transaction in Rabby does not match the state on-chain.
setting.clearPendingDesc2: This will not change the balances in your accounts or require you to re-enter your seed phrase. All your assets and accounts information will remain secure.
setting.clearPendingWarning: The removed transaction may still be confirmed on-chain unless it is replaced.
setting.clearPendingResetDesc: Also reset my local nonce data and signature record

clearAppCache.clearAppCacheDesc: This will remove temporary cached files without impacting your personal data or settings. The app needs to restart to complete the process. Do you wish to continue?
clearAppCache.iOSToastDesc: You need to restart the app to take effect.

clearBrowserData.title: Clear Browser Data
clearBrowserData.desc: This will close all browser tabs and delete all browsing history.

perps.title: Perps

PerpsRiskPopup.title: Risk Level
PerpsRiskPopup.subtitle: Real-time liquidation distance (%)
PerpsRiskPopup.liqIntro: Liquidation Distance (%) shows how far the current price is from your liquidation price. A larger distance indicates a safer position, while a smaller distance means higher liquidation risk.

PerpsCard.title: Trade Perps
PerpsCard.loginDesc: Log in with your address and deposit funds to start trading perps

perps.selectAccountTitle: Select a Wallet to Log In

PerpsGuidePopup.step1Desc: With perpetual futures, you're not just trading assets. You're trading what you think will happen next
PerpsGuidePopup.step2Desc: When you expect the price to rise, you open a long. If the price rises, you gain. If it falls, you lose.
PerpsGuidePopup.step3Desc: When you expect the price to fall, you open a short. If the price falls, you gain. If it rises, you lose.
PerpsGuidePopup.step4Desc: Leverage lets you trade with more than you put in. It can increase both your gains and your losses.
PerpsGuidePopup.step5Desc: Every position has a liquidation price. If the market price reaches it, your position will be closed. Using higher leverage increases the risk of being liquidated

PerpsDepositPopup.title: Deposit
PerpsDepositPopup.estReceiveTooltip: Cross-chain deposit is processed via LiFi, may incur some slippage. Estimated arrival in {{number}}s.
PerpsDepositPopup.fetchQuoteFailed: Failed to fetch deposit quote. Please switch token.

historyDetail.sizeTips: The total value or quantity of your trade, set by margin and leverage.

PerpsAutoCloseModal.takeProfitTipsLong: Take profit price must be higher than current price
PerpsAutoCloseModal.stopLossTipsLong: Stop loss price must be lower than current price
PerpsAutoCloseModal.takeProfitTipsShort: Take profit price must be lower than current price
PerpsAutoCloseModal.stopLossTipsLongLiquidation: Price is lower than the liquidation price ({{price}})
PerpsAutoCloseModal.stopLossTipsShort: Stop loss price must be higher than current price
PerpsAutoCloseModal.stopLossTipsShortLiquidation: Price is higher than the liquidation price ({{price}})

perps.closeAllConfirmMessage: All your open positions will be closed at market price.

PerpsDepositTokenModal.goSwapDesc: Only USDC on Arbitrum is supported for direct deposit. Please swap your current token to USDC before depositing.
PerpsDepositTokenModal.goBridgeDesc: Only USDC on Arbitrum is supported for direct deposit. Please bridge your current token to USDC on Arbitrum before depositing.

PerpsAccountLogoutPopup.title: Log Out Current Address
PerpsAccountLogoutPopup.desc: You are logging out of your current Perps account. You can restore it anytime by logging in with this address.

perps.regionNotSupport: Opening positions is not supported in your region
perps.deleteAgentModal: You’ve reached the maximum number of agents. Would you delete an existing agent to create a new one?

PerpsPosition.title: Position
PerpsPosition.liquidationPriceTips: The price at which your position is automatically closed by the exchange to prevent further losses when your margin falls below the maintenance margin level.
PerpsPosition.fundingPaymentsTips: This is the net funding payments since the position was opened. Funding is an hourly fee that traders pay or receive to keep the price of the perp contract close to the actual price of the token.
PerpsPosition.fundingGainsTips: This is the net funding gains since the position was opened. Funding is an hourly fee that traders pay or receive to keep the price of the perp contract close to the actual price of the token.
PerpsPosition.sizeTips: The total value or quantity of your trade, set by margin and leverage.

PerpMarginModePopup.cannotChangeMarginMode: Cannot change Margin Mode with open positions
PerpMarginModePopup.crossDesc: All positions share the same margin. This reduces the chance of a single position being liquidated, but all cross-margin funds can be lost in extreme market moves.
PerpMarginModePopup.isolatedDesc: Each position uses its own margin. Losses are limited to that position, but it can be liquidated more easily.

perpsDetail.needDepositFirst: You need to deposit funds first.

PerpsInfo.title: Info
PerpsInfo.openInterestTips: The total outstanding position of all users on this contract.
PerpsInfo.fundingTips: This is an hourly fee that traders pay or receive to keep the price of the perp contract close to the actual price of the token. lf positive, long pays short. lf negative, short pays long.

PerpsIntro.title: What’s Perps ?
PerpsIntro.desc: Trading perpetual contracts involves significant risks, including the possibility of losing your investment and collateral rapidly due to high leverage and market volatility. Such trading may not be suitable for all users. Prices may be affected by funding rates and liquidity, and you could be automatically liquidated without prior notice. Market data is provided by Hyperliquid.

PerpsOpenPositionPopup.sizeTips: The total value or quantity of your trade, set by margin and leverage.

PerpsOpenPositionCheckPopup.title: Check Order
PerpsOpenPositionCheckPopup.liquidationPriceTips: The price at which your position is automatically closed by the exchange to prevent further losses when your margin falls below the maintenance margin level.
PerpsOpenPositionCheckPopup.sizeTips: The total value or quantity of your trade, set by margin and leverage.

action.noPermission: Opening positions is not supported in your region

availableCard.canBorrow: You can borrow based on your supplied collateral, up to the borrow cap.
availableCard.needSupply: To borrow, you need to supply assets as collateral.
availableCard.isolated: Borrowing power and assets are limited due to Isolation mode.
availableCard.emode: In E-Mode some assets are not borrowable.Exit E-Mode to get access to all assets
availableCard.emodeNoAssets: We couldn't find any assets related to your search. Try again with a different category.

empty.title: Earn Interest with your assets
empty.description: Powered by AAVE. Secure and zero fees.
empty.endDesc: You don’t have any deposits yet. Check out below recommended assets to start earning interest.

summary.lq: If goes below 1, the liquidation might be triggered.

supplyDetail.isolatedTips: Your existing lending/borrowing assets are not supported.

toggleCollateralDetail.error: There is some error with the AAVE service. Please try again later.

toggleCollateralModal.openDesc: Enabling this asset as collateral increases your borrowing power and Health Factor. However, it can get liquidated if your health factor drops below 1.
toggleCollateralModal.closeDesc: Disabling this asset as collateral affects your borrowing power and Health Factor.
toggleCollateralModal.enableIsolationModeDesc: You are entering Isolation mode. In Isolation mode, you cannot supply other assets as collateral. A global debt ceiling limits the borrowing power of the isolated asset. To exit isolation mode disable CRV as collateral before borrowing another asset.
toggleCollateralModal.exitIsolationModeDesc: You will exit Isolation mode and other tokens can now be used as collateral.
toggleCollateralModal.riskToLiquidationText: You can not switch usage as collateral mode for this currency, because it will cause collateral call

toggleRiskTexts.doNotHaveSuppliesInThisCurrency: You do not have supplies in this currency
toggleRiskTexts.canNotUseThisCurrencyAsCollateral: You can not use this currency as collateral
toggleRiskTexts.canNotSwitchUsageAsCollateralMode: You can not switch usage as collateral mode for this currency, because it will cause collateral call
toggleRiskTexts.zeroLTVWithdrawBlocked: Assets with zero LTV ({{assets}}) must be withdrawn or disabled as collateral to perform this action

borrowDetail.almostReachedWarning: Protocol borrow cap is at 100% for this asset. Further borrowing unavailable.
borrowDetail.almostReachedError: Maximum amount available to borrow is limited because protocol borrow cap is nearly reached.

borrowOverview.title: Borrow Details
borrowOverview.reachCapTip: This asset has reached the borrow cap.

supplyOverview.title: Supply Details
supplyOverview.reachCap: This asset has reached its supply cap. Nothing is available to be supplied from this market.
supplyOverview.almostCap: This asset has almost reached its borrow cap. There is only {{available}} available to be borrowed from this market.

risk.warning: Borrowing this amount will lower your Health Factor to a risky level for liquidation.
risk.withdrawWarning: Withdrawing this amount will lower your Health Factor to a risky level for liquidation.
risk.toggleCollateralWarning: Disabling this asset as collateral will lower your Health Factor to a risky level for liquidation.
risk.checkbox: I understand the alert and want to continue.
risk.emodeBlockWarning: Disabling E-mode will lower your Health Factor to a risky level for liquidation.
risk.blockEmodeWarning: You can not disable E-Mode because that could cause liquidation. To exit E-Mode supply or repay borrowed positions.

lqDescription.introText: Your Health Factor shows how safe your borrowing position is. If it drops too low, your collateral could be liquidated.
lqDescription.below1desc: Your position is at risk of liquidation.
lqDescription.liquidation: Liquidation: If your Health Factor falls below 1.0, part of your collateral may be automatically sold to repay the debt. A liquidation penalty will apply, resulting in a partial loss of your collateral.
lqDescription.warningText:
Your Health Factor is too low. To avoid liquidation:
1. Repay part or all of your loan
2. Add more collateral

modalDesc.maxAmount: This is the maximum amount you can borrow based on all your supplied collateral. Your total borrowing power is calculated by multiplying the market value of each collateral asset by its Max LTV, then summing the results.
modalDesc.lqDesc: When a liquidation occurs, liquidators repay up to 50% of the outstanding borrowed amount on behalf of the borrower. In return, they can buy the collateral at a discount and keep the difference (liquidation penalty) as a bonus.
modalDesc.availableToBorrowDesc: You can borrow based on your supplied collateral and until the borrow cap is reached.
modalDesc.isolatedTitle: Asset cannot be used as collateral
modalDesc.isolatedDesc: This asset can only be used as collateral in isolation mode, where you cannot supply other asset collateral for borrowing. Assets used as collateral in isolation mode can only be borrowed to a specific debt ceiling.
modalDesc.globalIsolatedDesc: In Isolation mode, you cannot supply other assets as collateral. A global debt ceiling limits the borrowing power of the isolated asset. To exit isolation mode disable UNI as collateral before borrowing another asset.
modalDesc.isolatedSupplyDesc: Collateral usage is limited because of isolation mode.
modalDesc.maxLTV: The Maximum LTV ratio represents the maximum borrowing power of a specific collateral. For example, if a collateral has an LTV of 75%, the user can borrow up to 0.75 worth of ETH in the principal currency for every 1 ETH worth of collateral.

manageEmode.title: Manage E-Mode
manageEmode.unavailableTips: Your existing lending/borrowing assets are not supported.
manageEmode.description: Enabling E-Mode allows you to maximize your borrowing power. However, borrowing is restricted to assets within the selected category.

guide.title: Efficiency mode (E-Mode)
guide.description: E-Mode increases your LTV for a selected category of assets.

categorySelector.label: Asset category
categorySelector.desc: All borrow positions outside of this category must be closed to enable this category.

debtSwap.entryTips: One-click to swap your borrowed asset, reducing steps and fees.
debtSwap.title: Swap Borrow Position
debtSwap.priceImpactTips: High price impact ({{lostValue}}). This route may return more due to low liquidity or small order size.
debtSwap.lpRiskWarning: Low health factor after swap. Your position will carry a higher risk of liquidation.
debtSwap.lpDangerWarning: Your health factor after this swap will be critically low and may result in liquidation. Please choose a different asset or reduce the swap amount to stay safe.

repayWithCollateral.collateralNotEnough: Your collateral balance is lower than the selected amount.

hfTips.desc: If it drops below 1.0, your collateral may be liquidated.

disableBorrowTip.desc: No supply: To borrow you need to supply assets as collateral.

loginInTip.title: Deposit USDC / USDT
loginInTip.desc: Pay Gas Fees on All Chains
loginInTip.depositDesc: on All Chains when you’re out of gas

about.desc1: GasAccount is a new way to pay gas fees. Instead of using native tokens on each chain, you can use one account to cover gas for all your addresses on all chains. Simple, optional, and never out of gas.
about.desc2: Add funds to your GasAccount and use it for any transaction. When signing, choose to pay gas with native tokens or GasAccount, switch anytime.
about.desc3: Rabby Wallet charges no extra fees. You only pay the gas for your transaction and a small amount of gas for sending that gas from GasAccount to your address.
about.desc4: GasAccount requires no contract approvals or permissions. You deposit to Rabby’s GasAccount address, and Rabby sends gas to your address when needed. Fully secure by design.

loginConfirmModal.title: Select Wallet to Login
loginConfirmModal.desc: Once login, you can only deposit it at this address

depositPopup.title: Deposit
depositPopup.desc: Make a deposit to Rabby's DeBank L2 Account with no extra fees—withdraw anytime.
